1.0.name: wordpress/wpsiren-random-post-by-click
1.0.description:
WPSIREN Random Post by Click is a free plugin to acccess a random post in your wordpress blog. You can display the widget in your blog sidebar as a button, and customize the text, background colors, font size and border radius. Check out the following options of this plugin in the below documentation.

  1. Enable Title

    Check / Uncheck to hide / show widget title

  2. Title

    Sets the title of the widget

  3. Button Text

    Enter the text which has to be displayed on the button

  4. Button Background Color

    Sets the background color of the button

  5. Button Text Color

    Sets the text color of the button

  6. Button Background Color Hover

    Sets the onhover background color of the button

  7. Button Text Color Hover

    Sets the onhover text color of the button

  8. Button Border Radius

    Sets the border radius of the button

  9. Font siz
